alert.note: Alert for Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 05 at 1:56PM PST until March 07 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 inches to 3 feet. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph over the crest and exposed ridgetops. A few Thunderstorms are also possible through Sunday. * WHERE...Sierra Nevada mainly above 3,000 feet from Yosemite National Park to Sequoia National Park. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Yosemite NP outside of the valley
